title: 哈哈哈，羊驼太逗了
author: 白桦树树干
txt_content:
QQ截图20161023164853.png (238.03 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2016-10-23 16:40 上传





就看到这些羊驼，就想起XX马，然后就笑疯了。这谁想的主意，还让不让人好好玩游戏了。莫名其妙的就想笑，然后就玩不下去了
其实三国杀里也有




1.jpg (4.89 KB, 下载次数: 0)

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
嗯。然而我并看不到图 炸了么？





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.txt_content:

否则，将会有50000只XX马在mojang天天跑圈
